mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY wsubject DESC) NUM,Wiki.* FROM Wiki WHERE ${param2} LIKE '%${param3}%' )A WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1+(#{param1}-1)*10 AND #{param1}*10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS(date1, date2, wcontent, wcategory, wpic, wsubject) VALUES(#{date1},#{date2},#{wcontent},#{wcategory},#{wpic},#{wsubject})
